403.text1: Seems like you do not have the permission to view this page.
403.text2: If you think this is a mistake, check if you are logged into the correct account or contact your administrator to inquire about your permissions.
403.title: Permission denied

404.text1: An error occurred while trying to navigate to the requested page
404.text2: Let’s contact the mission control to recalculate the route.
404.title: Navigation error

action.emptySearch: Your search for {msg} found no results.

roles.description: Please select the roles associated with the user. The roles define the permissions granted to the user.
roles.name: Roles

confirmationDialog.message: Are you sure you want to delete user ({username})?
confirmationDialog.title: Are you sure?

keyDetails.name: Key Details
keyDetails.note: NOTE: save the API key in a secure place.
keyDetails.noteDetail: The API key is visible only at the time of key generation. It will not be presented again and cannot be retrieved later.

roles.description: Please select the roles associated with the API key. The roles define the permissions granted to the API key.
roles.name: Roles

dialog.message: Roles associated with the API key:
dialog.title: Edit API Key (ID: {id})

confirmationDialog.message: Are you sure you want to revoke the API key with ID {id}?
confirmationDialog.title: Are you sure?

revoke.success: API key with ID {id} successfully revoked

messages.localConfWarning: Warning! The file “/etc/xroad/services/local.conf” used for configuration overrides is deprecated and not included in the backups anymore. The file “/etc/xroad/services/local.properties” should be used instead.

dialog.confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete backup {file}?
dialog.title: Are you sure?

dialog.confirmation: Are you sure you want to restore from {file}?
dialog.title: Are you sure?

confirmationDialog.confirmation: File {name} already exists, are you sure you want to overwrite it?

error_code.internal_error: Internal error. See server logs for more details
error_code.token_weak_pin: The provided pin code was too weak

tr.check_signer_logs: Please check the signer log for details.

error_code.user_password_invalid_characters: The provided password contains invalid characters
error_code.user_weak_password: The provided password was too weak

logout.idleWarning: You have been idle for 30 minutes and your session has expired. For security reasons, you will be logged out.

tlsCertificates.downloadSuccess: Management service TLS certificate successfully downloaded

generateCsr.content: First, provide a distinguished name. Then, generate a new CSR and save it into a safe place
generateCsr.title: Generate TLS Certificate Signing Request
generateCsr.tooltip: The Distinguished Name (DN) uniquely identifies an entity in an X.509 certificate. The following attribute types are commonly found in the DN: CN = Common name, O = Organization name, C = Country code.

uploadCertificate.label: Upload the certificate file from your computer

validationError.DecimalMax: numeric value exceeds the maximum allowed
validationError.DecimalMin: numeric value is under the minimum allowed
validationError.Email: value does not meet the email format
validationError.Future: datetime value should be in the future
validationError.FutureOrPresent: datetime value should be now or in the future
validationError.Max: numeric value exceeds the maximum allowed
validationError.Min: numeric value is under the minimum allowed
validationError.Negative: numeric value should be less than zero
validationError.NegativeOrZero: numeric value should be less or equal to zero
validationError.NoBackslashes: value should not contain backslash (\) symbols
validationError.NoColons: value should not contain colon (:) symbols
validationError.NoForwardslashes: value should not contain forward slash (/) symbols
validationError.NoPercents: value should not contain percentage (%) symbols
validationError.NoSemicolons: value should not contain semicolon (;) symbols
validationError.Past: datetime value should be in the past
validationError.PastOrPresent: datetime value should be now or in the past
validationError.Pattern: value did not match the required format
validationError.Positive: numeric value should be greater that zero
validationError.PositiveOrZero: numeric value should be greater or equal to zero
validationError.Size: value does not meet length requirements
validationError.ValidHostAddress: Valid fully qualified domain name (e.g. host.example.org) or public IP address (eg. 192.168.123.123) needed
validationError.ValidHostAddressField: Valid IP address or fully qualified domain name needed
